actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: A bill to prohibit Soviet energy investments.

summary.text: Soviet Energy Investment Prohibition Act - Provides that no department, agency, or instrumentality of the United States Government may directly or indirectly provide assistance to finance or otherwise promote the export of any commodity, product, or service from the United States if the intended use of such commodity, product, or service, involves energy research and development or energy exploration in the Union of Soviet Socalist Republics.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit Soviet energy investments.
